field.label: Description
field.description: Enter description of images, enter empty line break if you don't want to display description for image

field.name: rebuildcache
field.label: Rebuild Cache
field.description: Set this to 'Yes' when you change above images and it's description to rebuild cache. Don't forget to change it back to 'No' after you confirm your change is applied in front end for optimal performance.

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

field.name: shadow
field.label: Shadow
field.description: Select whether you want shadow or not.

field.name: width
field.label: Width
field.description: Set the module width. Must be equal to image width.

field.name: height
field.label: Height
field.description: Set the module height. Must be equal to image height.

field.name: segments
field.label: Number of segments
field.description: Number of segments, in which the images will be sliced

field.name: tweenTime
field.label: Tween time
field.description: Number of seconds to turn each element.

field.name: tweenDelay
field.label: Tween delay
field.description: Number of seconds from one element starting to turn to the next element starting

field.name: zDistance
field.label: Z Distance
field.description: To which extent are the cubes moved on z axis when being tweened. Negative values bring the cube closer to the camera, positive values take it further away. A good range is roughly between -200 and 700

field.name: expand
field.label: Expand
field.description: To which extent are the cubes moved away from each other when tweening

field.name: innerColor
field.label: Inner color
field.description: Select color of the sides of the elements

field.name: textBackground
field.label: Text background
field.description: Select color of the description text background

field.name: shadowDarkness
field.label: Shadow darkness
field.description: To which extent are the sides shadowed, when the elements are tweening and the sided move towards the background. 100 is black, 0 is no darkening

field.name: textDistance
field.label: Text distance
field.description: Distance of the info text to the borders of its background

field.name: autoplay
field.label: Autoplay
field.description: Number of seconds to the next image, when autoplay is on. Set 0, if you do not want autoplay
